title.bibl: Svenska Tribunen-Nyheter, Aug. 10, 1921. The Lutheran Central Home Expands

div.bibl: Svenska Tribunen-Nyheter, Aug. 10, 1921. THE LUTHERAN CENTRAL HOME EXPANDS

body.p: The Chicago Lutheran City Mission League has taken title to the property-located at 1342 North La Salle Street, which has been bought for the purpose of expanding the Central Home. The newly acquired property borders on that of the Home, and on it is a three-story building containing twenty-two rooms. This building will now be remodeled and modernized and made part of the Home.
The price paid for the property was $18,000, which was considered reasonable.
